channel.title: Python on Ryan Wong
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Ryan Wong

item.title: Premier League Game Recommender
item.description: Project aims to explore what factors makes a Premier League game is memorable/worth watching and generate a list of recommended Premier League games to watch.

item.title: Summer Olympics
item.description: This post seeks to explore and visualize trends with summer olympics data.

item.title: App Store Game Ratings
item.description: Project aims to predict the app store rating of a mobile game using linear regression, considering factors such as game size, genre, and price.
